attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since e-petitions started every idiot with an axe to grind thinks their opinion suddenly matters. My major source of spam is no longer African academics offering to share their fortune with me. No, it seems that every individual who has my e-mail address now wants me to e-sign some e-document about one petty selfishness or another in order that they can advance their own particular e-agenda. If you want to express an opinion, your MP can listen. That's what he's paid for. Stop wasting my time.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
